post.body: Bailey's sounds like a risk but I'll take it ;)
HAHAHA I'll give you until 11:00. Just because I think you will need it. ;)
I thought u went to bed. lol
love the name! #vancouvertweetupheatup. I know my multitasking skills rock! LOL almost lost the Iphone in the tub though. Ooops
I'm actiually will try to do it in the afternoon. I have a "Christmas" dinner with 3 friends. At night. :)
great! Do u wanna join me tomorrow? Let's try to get more people involved #vancouvertweetup with a cause!
that's all I'm saying hahaha
LOL Iike it! I think we are gonna need lots of bailey's!
rain will come down soon. I think that's the only guarantee this town :P let's just enjoy the snow in the meantime.
hahaha like I said before I like the way you think! I'm in.
same as @JaniceLaing LOL LOL LOL
I know but in Vancouver it will only last for a week or so before the rain washes it off like last year. LOL
I know apparently is a whole Twitter problem. They've reduced the delays from 1hr to 11minutes though.
Hmmmm Don't have one i live in a condo. Other options?
We can try to arrange a sponsor... good idea! And Ok. I'll give you that, if swallowing makes you ill u're allowed to spit.
I love Concierto de Aranjuez. Definitely a very nice piece. I should start listening some acoustic guitar again...
and half messed it up again... LOL
true. Very very true. "honor your neighbor by shoveling thy snow" LOL.
it was worth it. Too bad I had to do it from the iPhone and I messed it up a little bit with that typo. lol
hmmm. Never been a big fan of the spitting. :P
now we just need to come up with a date!
LOL. Allow me to retweet that. And on that note, sadly we all know people like @shanegibson's friends. Sigh.
that is exactly whatvitbis, combined with the fact that ppl in this city don't know what to do when it snows. Smh.
there u go! That's the spirit.
like the idea. I definitely do. Well I guess you should probably give Scotch at least a chance. :P
well. How about Scotch and cocktails too? Sounds like u & Scotch are not the best of friends eh?
ohhh! Don't scare @kittyinvancity Scotch is pretty good. Depending on which one you're having though.
ATTENTION VANCOUVER!!! #vancouvertweetupheatup Sun 21st afternoon Downtown. Wanna join? Plz retweet! Get ur warm unused clothes out!
Please @JaniceLaing or @tyamdm me or DM for more info on the #vancouvertweetupheatup Sunday 21st afternoon! THANKS!
ATTENTION VANCOUVER!!! #vancouvertweetupheatup tomorrow afternoon Downtown. Wanna join? Please re-tweet! Get ur warm unused clothes out!
I underestimated how hot the Hot Tub is when your body is freakin' cold because is -10 out.
Oh yeah and Diana Krall's Christmas Songs album playing!
Ahhh! Hot tub while watching the snow outside! :))))
Looking for warm clothing that i dont use anymore to take out with me and try to find people to give it to. Argh! It's all in the storage.
I don't think black ice + fresh snow is a good combination for the already bad drivers in Vancouver.
Raining like crazy in Vancouver... Relax people! Stop complaining, stop crying, stop freaking out! Van City is back to normal.
Am I the only one having problems getting tweets today?
Rogers 3G connection was down for a few minutes. It seems to be ok now.
Going to "mail it in"! Have a good night all! See you in the morning.
RT: @ericaha - @tyamdm But does it really take rocket science to figure out thy snow should be shoveled and warm clothes should be worn?
